member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE
member.summary: The DWRITE_PANOSE union describes typeface classification values that you use with to select and match the font.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.values
member.summary: A 10-byte array of typeface classification values.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.familyKind
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the typeface classification values to get.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text
member.summary: The text structure.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.familyKind
member.summary: The value (2) that specifies text display typeface classification.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.serifStyle
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the serif style of text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.weight
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the weight of the text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.proportion
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the proportion for the text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.contrast
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the contrast for the text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.strokeVariation
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the stroke variation for the text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.armStyle
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the arm style of text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.letterform
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the letter form for the text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.midline
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the midline for the text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.text.xHeight
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the relative size of lowercase text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.script
member.summary: The script structure.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.script.familyKind
member.summary: The value (3) that specifies script typeface classification.

member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the kind of tool for the script.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.script.weight
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the weight of the script.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.script.spacing
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the spacing of the script.

member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the aspect ratio of the script.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.script.contrast
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the contrast for the script.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.script.scriptTopology
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the script topology.

member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the script finials.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE.script.xAscent
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the relative size of lowercase letters.
